api.title: Météo France API Configuration
api.description:
Enter your Météo France API token to access avalanche risk assessment bulletins (BRA).

To get a free token:
1. Create an account on https://portail-api.meteofrance.fr
2. Subscribe to the 'Données Publiques DPBRA' API
3. Copy your API token

This token will be used for all your mountain ranges.

select_api.title: Adding a New Mountain Range
select_api.description:
You are about to add a new mountain range to monitor.

If you have multiple API tokens, select which one to use.

department.title: Department Selection
department.description:
Select the department where the mountain range you want to monitor is located.

Departments are grouped by mountain massif (Alps, Pyrenees, Corsica).

massif.title: Mountain Range Selection
massif.description:
Select the mountain range for which you want to receive avalanche risk assessment bulletins.

You can add more mountain ranges later by running this integration again.

reconfigure.title: Update API Token
reconfigure.description:
Update your Météo France API token.

Warning: This change will affect all mountain ranges using this API configuration.

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to the Météo France API. Check your internet connection and that the API token is valid.
error.invalid_auth: The API token is not valid. Make sure you copied the complete token from the Météo France portal.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Check the Home Assistant logs for more details.

abort.already_configured: This mountain range is already configured in Home Assistant. You cannot add it twice.
abort.no_api: No API configuration found. You must first configure your Météo France API token before adding a mountain range.
abort.not_api: This entry is not an API configuration and cannot be reconfigured.
abort.reconfigure_successful: The API token has been successfully updated. All your mountain ranges will now use this new token.
